name: Kazo
content:
Kazo was a Male Selkath who lived during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. He served in the Republic Navy as a Lieutenant and was stationed on the planet Coruscant. On Coruscant he worked out of the Equipment Requisitions area of the Senate Commercial District and supplied the commander of Havoc Squad with gear.
Kazo first appeared in the MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a vendor of Player vs. Player gear for the Trooper class. He is only accessible to Republic players in the game as he is found on Coruscant which is a Republic only planet.
